# netbird_scim (Resource)

Create and manage SCIM integrations, see [NetBird Docs](https://docs.netbird.io/manage/team/idp-sync) for more information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "netbird_scim" "example" {
  provider_name       = "okta"
  prefix              = "okta-scim"
  enabled             = true
  group_prefixes      = ["engineering", "product"]
  user_group_prefixes = ["users"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `provider_name` (String) Name of the SCIM identity provider

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether the integration is enabled
- `group_prefixes` (List of String) List of start_with string patterns for groups to sync
- `prefix` (String) The connection prefix used for the SCIM provider.
- `user_group_prefixes` (List of String) List of start_with string patterns for groups which users to sync

### Read-Only

- `auth_token` (String, Sensitive) SCIM API token (only available in full after creation)
- `id` (String) SCIM integration ID
- `last_synced_at` (String) Timestamp of when the integration was last synced
